from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType, ArrayType
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql.types import *
from datetime import datetime

def get_folder_path(tier, data_source_id, database_schema, entity, dt, add_file_name=False, extension=None):
    year, month, day, hour, minute, second = extract_datetime_attributes(dt)
    path = f"abfss://data-platform@omweuadls001.dfs.core.windows.net/"
    path += f"{tier}/{data_source_id}/{database_schema}/{entity}/{year}/{month:02d}/{day:02d}/"
    if add_file_name: path += f"{entity}_{year}{month:02d}{day:02d}-{hour:02d}{minute:02d}{second:02d}"
    if extension is not None: path += f".{extension}"
    return path
